title: Bug Splat after champ select before load screen
body: Why is my game suddenly bug splatting after champ select and before loading screen? Nothing has changed on my end, it just started two days ago. I have a ticket in and no response from riot for 2 days.

replies.body: There have been a number of Windows updates as well as the recent Nvidia drivers that have enabled some features that may be causing some issues. For additional context, can you provide me your OS (Windows 10, 8.1, 7) and the model number of your video card (Nvidia GTX 1080, 980M, 650ti)? With a bit more context, I'll have a better understanding what may be affecting you.

I am operating on Windows 10 with a NVIDIA GeForce 960. I have ensured that both are as up to date as possible.

Thank you for this post! I was able to load my game once I set my display settings to "native" resolution. I was able to find a further work around by loading the game in "native" and then accessing my NVIDIA card and changing the resolution there. I can now run the game in the mode I was previously running. 

I was finally contacted by Riot through my ticket - with no useful information for correcting this problem. Thanks again!
I have been having this for the past few days as well. I think its a huge problem... i dont get why we are not being addressed...
it may not be something on Riots end. In my case the issue was from windows updates. finding work arounds for these aren't always quick and easy.

Posting here if anyone else is having issues regarding bug splat after champ select. For me the cause was windows had updated things over the course of last night. This wouldn't be too terribly bad but I am running windows 10. The only solution i could come up with is a temporary fix until we get something more concrete which is the revert everything back to my last windows build. This may not be an ideal solution for everyone to run as it could change some system information and I am not too familiar with what will all change if you do this outside it undoing the update. This process will also take some time to finish as well.

Hope this helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Jlowe08,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3RueXuYJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-26T16:07:23.586+0000)
>
> Why is my game suddenly bug splatting after champ select and before loading screen? Nothing has changed on my end, it just started two days ago. I have a ticket in and no response from riot for 2 days.

Exact same bug for me, was working fine since last tuesday then started to Bug Splat everytime it tries to get to loading....
Can someone from Riot help us ??

> [{quoted}](name=Jlowe08,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3RueXuYJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-26T16:07:23.586+0000)
>
> Why is my game suddenly bug splatting after champ select and before loading screen? Nothing has changed on my end, it just started two days ago. I have a ticket in and no response from riot for 2 days.

It sounds like your game is failing to render, and can be cause by a few issues like outdated drivers or bad game files.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide and going over each steep to get this fixed.  There may be a bit of a wait depending on the size of the queue for the day, but this guide should help in the meantime!

I have been through this guide three times... No results...

On top of going through that guide numerous times, I have also tried doing a clean install - no luck. I was not having this problem until Friday evening.
